articles.content: It will be interesting to see what team Hardik Pandya and VVS Laxman play in the final T20I. It is said by many experts that Pant should open in T20Is. He opened on Sunday but could not create a big … [+406 chars]

articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
